00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include "bits/type_traits.h"
00026 
00027 
00028 #define CXX_GCC_VERSION (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__)
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace cxx {
00032 
00033 template< typename T, T V >
00034 struct integral_constant
00035 {
00036   static T const value = V;
00037   typedef T value_type;
00038   typedef integral_constant<T, V> type;
00039 };
00040 
00041 typedef integral_constant<bool, true> true_type;
00042 typedef integral_constant<bool, false> false_type;
00043 
00044 template< typename T > struct remove_reference;
00045 
00046 template< typename T > struct idendity { typedef T type; };
00047 
00048 template< typename T1, typename T2 > struct is_same;
00049 
00050 template< typename T > struct remove_const;
00051 
00052 template< typename T > struct remove_volatile;
00053 
00054 template< typename T > struct remove_cv;
00055 
00056 template< typename T > struct remove_pointer;
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060 template< typename, typename >
00061 struct is_same : public false_type {};
00062 
00063 template< typename T >
00064 struct is_same<T, T> : public true_type {};
00065 
00066 template< typename T >
00067 struct remove_reference { typedef T type; };
00068 
00069 template< typename T >
00070 struct remove_reference<T &> { typedef T type; };
00071 
00072 #ifdef __GXX_EXPERIMENTAL_CXX0X__
00073 template< typename T >
00074 struct remove_reference<T &&> { typedef T type; };
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 template< typename T > struct remove_const { typedef T type; };
00078 template< typename T > struct remove_const<T const> { typedef T type; };
00079 
00080 template< typename T > struct remove_volatile { typedef T type; };
00081 template< typename T > struct remove_volatile<T volatile> { typedef T type; };
00082 
00083 template< typename T >
00084 struct remove_cv { typedef typename remove_const<typename remove_volatile<T>::type>::type type; };
00085 
00086 template< typename T, typename >
00087 struct __remove_pointer_h { typedef T type; };
00088 
00089 template< typename T, typename I >
00090 struct __remove_pointer_h<T, I*> { typedef I type; };
00091 
00092 template< typename  T >
00093 struct remove_pointer : public __remove_pointer_h<T, typename remove_cv<T>::type> {};
00094 
00095 #ifdef __GXX_EXPERIMENTAL_CXX0X__
00096 #if CXX_GCC_VERSION >= 405
00097 
00098 template< typename T >
00099 inline T &&
00100 forward(typename cxx::remove_reference<T>::type &t)
00101 { return static_cast<T &&>(t); }
00102 
00103 template< typename T >
00104 inline T &&
00105 forward(typename cxx::remove_reference<T>::type &&t)
00106 { return static_cast<T &&>(t); }
00107 
00108 #else
00109 
00110 template< typename T >
00111 inline T &&
00112 forward(typename cxx::idendity<T>::type &&t)
00113 { return t; }
00114 
00115 #endif
00116 
00117 template< typename T >
00118 inline typename cxx::remove_reference<T>::type &&
00119 move(T &t) { return static_cast<typename cxx::remove_reference<T>::type &&>(t); }
00120 #endif
00121 
00122 template< bool, typename T = void >
00123 struct enable_if {};
00124 
00125 template< typename T >
00126 struct enable_if<true, T> { typedef T type; };
00127 
00128 }
